Gameplay

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • Gameplay.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains details concerning the current map in play, and determines if a collision has occurred.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(int width, int height, GameInfo game, Display display)
      Generates blank Map of given width and height
      Map(java.lang.String mapString, java.lang.String colour, GameInfo game, Display display)
      Generates Map from string
